attributes.action: make voting compulsory, and ensure that when positive, spoilt ballots count as NO, voting falls below 50% a constitutional review is undertaken and must be positively voted on by the native, born in the UK, electorate to reform the system of government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All people must have the right to live a life free from hurt and harm. We must be allowed to live our lives as we wish, doing no direct harm to others, without interference from or by any employee of the state. All employees of the people, be they State, central or local must be subject to a penalty, more severe than that for a citizen, for abusing powers promolgated or delegated by law.
